sentence.Network_en: Wealth is not necessarily synonymous with happiness.

第二，同义替换（synonymous substitution）。同义替换是雅思听力中的一个难点，各种题型中都会出现。
绝大多数同义词之间存在着语义上的微妙差异。同义词通常分为五类： i. 方言同义词（Dialectal synonyms ）

entry.tran: (与…)关系紧密的;等同(于)…的;互为依存的
entry.def: If you say that one thing is synonymous with another, you mean that the two things are very closely associated with each other so that one suggests the other or one cannot exist without the other.

example.ex: Paris has always been synonymous with elegance, luxury and style...
example.tran: 巴黎一直是优雅、奢华和时尚的代名词。

example.ex: Going grey is not necessarily synonymous with growing old...
example.tran: 头发变白并不一定等于变老了。

means.word_mean: 1. (of words) meaning the same or nearly the same
